snippet: Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer, the top two players in the world, advanced to the championship match at the ATP finals in London, each looking beatable before recovering.
abstract: Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer advance to men's championship match at ATP tennis finals in London.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer, the top two players in the world, advanced to the championship match at the ATP finals in London, each looking beatable before recovering.

headline.main: Djokovic and Federer Advance at ATP Finals
